name: hcx-integrator-sdk-js
description: This is an npm package for the SDK of hcx-integrator. The Health Claim Exchange(HCX) is a communication protocol that facilitates the exchange of health claim information between payers, providers, beneficiaries, and other relevant entities. It is designed to be an interopable, machine-readable, verifiable, which helps ensure that the information being exchanged is accurate and trustworthy. It is an open standard based communication,
author: Swasth
